game.shortDescription: MILFS 2025 - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

reviewHighlights.text: I've always wanted to know what the word MILF means. I came across this game and now it's my favorite word.
As far as I understand, in this style of drawing, a milf differs from a young woman only by the presence of a fat ass and glasses.
